animated-movies.title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
animated-movies.description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

animated-movies.title: Batman & Mr. Freeze: SubZero
animated-movies.description: When Mr. Freeze, desperate to save his dying wife, kidnaps Barbara Gordon (Batgirl) as an involuntary organ donor, Batman and Robin must find her before the operation can begin.

animated-movies.title: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
animated-movies.description: The Joker is back with a vengeance, and Gotham's newest Dark Knight needs answers as he stands alone to face Gotham's most infamous Clown Prince of Crime.
